name: Jolly Headhunter
description: Spreading the holiday cheer... with bullets.

heroPerk.name: Present... Arms!
heroPerk.description: Eliminated enemies have a <Number>0.15% chance</> to drop a present. Presents grant a buff lasting <Number>[Ability.Line5] seconds</> which can be <Number>108.50%</> <ModifiedAttribute>Movement Speed</>, <Number>106.50%</> <ModifiedAttribute>Damage</>, or <Number>[Ability.Line4]</> <ModifiedAttribute>Energy</> over time.

commanderPerk.name: Present... Arms! +
commanderPerk.description: Eliminated enemies have a <Number>0.15% chance</> to drop a present. Presents grant a buff lasting <Number>[Ability.Line5] seconds</> which can be <Number>117.00%</> <ModifiedAttribute>Movement Speed</>, <Number>113.00%</> <ModifiedAttribute>Damage</>, or <Number>[Ability.Line4]</> <ModifiedAttribute>Energy</> over time.

abilities.name: Lefty and Righty
abilities.description: Equip two pistols which deal [AbilityWeaponDamage.Value] physical damage per shot and fire [FireRate.Value] shots per second. Lasts [Ability.Duration] seconds.

abilities.name: Frag Grenade
abilities.description: Throw a grenade which deals [Damage.Value] energy damage in a [Radius] radius.

abilities.name: War Cry
abilities.description: Shout an inspiring War Cry, granting nearby allies +[Damage] weapon damage, +[Ability.Line5] fire rate, and +[Ability.Line4] melee attack speed for [Duration] seconds.
